subcommand.name: pr_close
subcommand.description:
Close a pull request. **IMPORTANT:** This tool operates asynchronously.
1. **Immediate Response:** Returns operation_id and status 'started'. NOT success.
2. **Final Result:** Result pushed automatically via MCP notification when complete.

**Your Instructions:**
- DO NOT wait for the final result.
- **DO** continue with other tasks that don't depend on this operation.
- You **MUST** process the future result notification to know if operation succeeded.

options.name: repo
options.description: The repository to close the pull request in.

options.name: comment
options.description: The comment to leave when closing the pull request.

positional_args.name: pr_number
positional_args.description: The number of the pull request to close.

subcommand.name: cache_list
subcommand.description:
List GitHub Actions caches. **IMPORTANT:** This tool operates asynchronously.
1. **Immediate Response:** Returns operation_id and status 'started'. NOT success.
2. **Final Result:** Result pushed automatically via MCP notification when complete.

**Your Instructions:**
- DO NOT wait for the final result.
- **DO** continue with other tasks that don't depend on this operation.
- You **MUST** process the future result notification to know if operation succeeded.

options.name: repo
options.description: Select another repository using the [HOST/]OWNER/REPO format

options.name: limit
options.description: Maximum number of caches to fetch (default: 30)

options.name: order
options.description: Order of caches returned: asc or desc (default: desc)

options.name: ref
options.description: Filter by ref, formatted as refs/heads/<branch name> or refs/pull/<number>/merge

options.name: sort
options.description: Sort fetched caches: created_at, last_accessed_at, or size_in_bytes (default: last_accessed_at)

subcommand.name: cache_delete
subcommand.description:
Delete GitHub Actions caches. **IMPORTANT:** This tool operates asynchronously.
1. **Immediate Response:** Returns operation_id and status 'started'. NOT success.
2. **Final Result:** Result pushed automatically via MCP notification when complete.

**Your Instructions:**
- DO NOT wait for the final result.
- **DO** continue with other tasks that don't depend on this operation.
- You **MUST** process the future result notification to know if operation succeeded.

options.name: repo
options.description: Select another repository using the [HOST/]OWNER/REPO format

options.name: succeed-on-no-caches
options.description: Return exit code 0 if no caches found. Must be used with --all

positional_args.name: cache_id_or_key
positional_args.description: Cache ID or cache key to delete (not required if using --all)

options.name: repo

positional_args.name: run_id

subcommand.name: run_view
subcommand.description:
View a summary of a workflow run. **IMPORTANT:** This tool operates asynchronously.
1. **Immediate Response:** Returns operation_id and status 'started'. NOT success.
2. **Final Result:** Result pushed automatically via MCP notification when complete.

**Your Instructions:**
- DO NOT wait for the final result.
- **DO** continue with other tasks that don't depend on this operation.
- You **MUST** process the future result notification to know if operation succeeded.

options.name: repo
options.description: Select another repository using the [HOST/]OWNER/REPO format

positional_args.name: run_id
positional_args.description: The ID of the workflow run to view (optional - will prompt if not provided)

subcommand.name: workflow_view

View the summary of a workflow. **IMPORTANT:** This tool operates asynchronously.
1. **Immediate Response:** Returns operation_id and status 'started'. NOT success.

options.name: repo

positional_args.name: workflow_selector
positional_args.description: Workflow ID, name, or filename (optional - will prompt if not provided)
